dim 3

define L_PARAM 15  # half of cell l
define L_PARAM2 5 # half of cell length minus radius
define R 10  # cell radius

species rabbit
species fox 

difc rabbit(solution) 100
difc fox(solution) 100

color rabbit 1 0 0
color fox 0 1 0
display_size rabbit 2
display_size fox 3

molecule_lists rlist flist
mol_list rabbit(solution) rlist
mol_list fox(solution) flist

time_start 0
time_stop 100
time_step 0.001

boundaries 0 -L_PARAM L_PARAM
boundaries 1 -R R
boundaries 2 -R R

mol 1000 rabbit u u u
mol 1000 fox u u u

reaction r1 rabbit -> rabbit + rabbit 10
reaction r2 rabbit + fox -> fox + fox 8000
reaction r3 fox -> 0 10

output_files lotvoltout.txt
cmd i 0 TIME_STOP 1 executiontime lotvoltout.txt
cmd i 0 TIME_STOP 1 listmols lotvoltout.txt
end_file
